name:
Pen Koozie in Black
by SANKAKU DESIGN
description:
Me & Arrow Collaboration with Sankaku designs.
This clever thing is a cover for your ordinary ball point pen.
It feels good when held and adds personality and style to an otherwise boring writing tool.

Leather will patina and add color and characters with ages.

We also use : Japanese ballpen : Indy gogo ballpen by Sailor. (7mm point and it doesn't smear. They are more than ordinary ball point pen!!)
